Derek Parfit was one of the most influential contemporary moral philosophers. He authored two major works:

* Reasons and Persons 
* On What Matters  

Derek Parfit died on the first day of January, 2017. He left behind his wife, Janet Radcliffe Richards, another influential philosopher of our time. 

[Here](http://www.lrb.co.uk/blog/2017/01/06/amia-srinivasan/remembering-derek-parfit/) is a link to a beautiful tribute written by one of his students.
